AI Genie
Product

Run AI workloads on a global network of idle compute resources at lower cost.

AI Genie orchestrates computing across decentralized hardware so founders and builders loop past hyperscaler complexity and focus on their models. The platform routes, verifies, and returns every execution without forcing long-term commitments.

Benefits
85% idle GPU capacity reclaimed

Taps unused hardware so teams access premium compute without waiting.

3 regions live in under 5 minutes

Deploy workloads globally from a single dashboard and stay focused on experimentation.

4 concurrent workloads

Parallelize pipelines for faster iteration without touching existing cloud contracts.

200 compute credits by default

Startups launch trials immediately with usable credits and zero upfront lock-in.

Explore the Product

Learn how AI Genie routes workloads, balances compute, and keeps every execution secure.
